snippet: Jim Rutenberg, chief political correspondent for the Sunday magazine, will fill the role last held by David Carr, who died in February.
abstract: New York Times announces chief political correspondent for New York Times Magazine Jim Rutenberg will become media columnist, role that has been vacant since death of David Carr in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Jim Rutenberg, chief political correspondent for the Sunday magazine, will fill the role last held by David Carr, who died in February.

headline.main: New York Times Names New Media Columnist
headline.print_headline: The Times Names Its New Media Columnist
